show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
·       Why has the Sierra Leone government rejected a miraculous Ebola cure that is cheap and safe? <!--more-->

·       What common foods are linked to getting lower grades?

·       Why doctors over-diagnose and over-treat high blood pressure.

·       What can predict our mortality 10-15 years early?

·       Does how old you feel affect how long you’ll live?

Vicki’s 20-20 tips are:

·       Think before you drink a latte.

·       Why you should keep apple cider vinegar in your pantry.
